entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kaladar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 02:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -8.7°C
Wind: E 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning and in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing late in the evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
